title: Learner-Centered Feedback Design: Project-Based Education in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies subject knowledge and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for elementary school teachers/pre-service teachers to conduct social studies field projects in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can design peer assessment rubrics applying the six dimensions of feedback (timing, frequency, source, personalization, etc.)
Learners can operate a real-time feedback exchange system during project execution using digital tools
Based on feedback analysis, learners can improve social education project outcomes by over 85%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
